abstract: Catherine Cai, a longtime Merrill Lynch banker, will take over as chairwoman and head of the China business.
snippet: Catherine Cai, a longtime Merrill Lynch banker, will take over as chairwoman and head of the China business.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG — Citigroup has hired a longtime China banker from Bank of America’s Merrill Lynch unit to be head of its investment banking in the country.

headline.main: Citigroup Names New Head of China Investment Banking
headline.print_headline: Citigroup Names New Head of China Investment Banking
